topics.body:
Okay! Final thoughts on Black★Rock Shooter!
Would I recommend it? Very much so! Is it good? I don't actually know yet. It has a lot of really cool elements and some really good characters. And it might take me a few more watches to fully understand it, but I enjoyed it a lot. It's only eight episodes long so if you have a free day try checking it out.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
